## Source: ossf-package-analysis (9ef3eb947d55786e4e156239f75c7441dd3b75e79ba9e53ca86c4def91f6ace4)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'support-conversations' @ 0.4.6 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
